reviews.text:
We are part of Purple Dragon Family for 4 months but it feels like the whole life. The atmosphere is amazing, a lot of classes for children which they really like.

The restaurant provides a menu where everyone will find something to eat.

They have a library, so if you need a quiet place then you can sit here and even do some work.

The swimming pool water is very comfortable and they offer a swimming classes (you will need to pay for them). Or you can use it by your own and enjoy time with you little one.

The soft play area is big and safe for kids.

So we enjoy our time here for almost every day ðŸ˜Š

Itâ€™s not only a heaven for kids, but also for parents! Gigantic space full of toys and different classes offered to kids. Very interactive and the staff are super nice. Impressed by the music room and the light room. I will certainly recommend it to families with young kids and babies!

Great club
Sensory classes could be abit more baby friendly with more variety not as good as messy monkeys
All other classes great but could be bit longer advertise as 30mins but generally only 15
Food great but always worth preordering so no wait time

We were very lucky to be able to come and spend a lovely Saturday at Purple Dragon. It was truly amazing! The attention to detail and the thought that has gone into making this club what it is, is exceptional.
All the toys are sustainable and wooden - not a coloured moulded plastic toy in sight. There is so much to do there that your children would never get bored.
We went into the art room and did some painting and playing with some freshly made Plasticine. We tried the cookery room and made some chocolate covered satsumas. The music room was amazing and we sat with one of the play-buddies on the guitar singing nursery rhymes! Ava loved the virtual football room the soft play climbing room was so much fun and the role play area was full of toys to really open up their imaginations!
All the play-buddies were so lovely, kind and thoughtful to all the children and you can tell the children have genuine affection for them and they really make this place what it is.
We also had lunch in the restaurant where the menu was very kid friendly and very reasonably priced too.
Unfortunately the pool was closed when we visited so i can't comment on that.
We all had such a lovely day and had so much fun!! Thank you so much!

We are members since spring last year.
On Saturday the 6th of May â€˜23 we had a birthday party for our little one.
I would like to thank Zak who helped us to have a magical party! Zak has been extremely helpful and I am very happy that someone with his experience is running the place properly! Samrat who is taking care of the events has been very cooperative and very very helpful with organising the party.
A huuuuge thank you to Noa who is really our favorite at Purple dragon and whatever he does he does it exceptionally well, Diana who was running non stop to make sure everything is immaculate with the food and the drinks and Roxana who was by my side helping me!!! Also a big thank you to the team at the music room! Thank you all for cheering us all and making this party a success!!

address: Ground Floor, 30 Gatliff Rd, London SW1W 8DP, United Kingdom
